constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 120 (Wednesday, July 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BACON:
H.R. 8439.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII, Clause 10: ``Congress shall have
the power to . . . define and punish . . . offences against
the Law of Nations''
[Page H6922]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: INARA Reforms Act
